name: staticip
text:
Static IP
Static IP: %1
Router IP: %2
Domain Name Server IP: %3
Type: %4
shortDescription: Set a static IP address. (Hint: Use before WiFi setup)
longDescription: This block allows you to set a static IP address.  Depending on how this block is used, a reboot may be needed for the address to take effect.  For example, if the Pi already has a network connection, then it will already have an address assigned by the router.  A reboot should reassign the IP.
